body_html:
Hi again, as you mentioned, as of now TF works on GPU + Windows. That's why it's in my experimental stage. In 'CMakeList.txt', there are options such as "(tensorflow_VERBOSE "Enable for verbose output" ON)" which you can pass options with :cmake" (e.g. cmake ... -Dxxx). The command "cmake ..." generates 'Makefile', then you can put 'sudo make'. As another build option apart from bazel, I think CMake is a cool feature. BTW, tf_stream_executor is blocking my progress with the error above, do you have any insight about this ?
Thanks!

Thanks!
body:
Hi again, as you mentioned, as of now TF works on GPU + Windows. That's why it's in my experimental stage. In 'CMakeList.txt', there are options such as "(tensorflow_VERBOSE "Enable for verbose output" ON)" which you can pass options with :cmake" (e.g. cmake  ... -Dxxx). The command "cmake ..." generates 'Makefile', then you can put 'sudo make'. As another build option apart from bazel, I think CMake is a cool feature. BTW, tf_stream_executor is blocking my progress with the error above, do you have any insight about this ? 
Thanks!
